title: Radical Index
text: What is the index of the radical?
speech: What is the index of the radical?
pacedSpeech: What is the index of the radical?

title: Even radical index
text: Since the radical index is $$2$$, it is even, so the radicand must be greater than or equal to $$0$$.
speech: Since the radical index is  2 , it is even, so the radicand must be greater than or equal to  0, .
pacedSpeech: , it is even, so the radicand must be greater than or equal to   0,

title: Solving the Radicand
speech: Solve , 3 x minus 4, is greater than or equal to 0
pacedSpeech: Solve  , 3 x minus 4, is greater than or equal to 0

title: Solve the Inequality
text: Add $$4$$ to both sides of the inequality.
speech: Add  4  to both sides of the inequality.
pacedSpeech: to both sides of the inequality.

title: Solve the Inequality
text: Divide both sides of the inequality by $$3$$. Then we get $$x$$ is greater than equal to $$\frac{4}{3}$$. We can write it in interval notation $$[\frac{4}{3},\infty)$$.
speech: Divide both sides of the inequality by  3 . Then we get  x  is greater than equal to  4 thirds . We can write it in interval notation , the closed open interval from 4 thirds to infinity .
pacedSpeech: Divide both sides of the inequality by   3
is greater than equal to   4 thirds
. We can write it in interval notation  , the closed open interval from 4 thirds to infinity
